name: Stock The Shelves (LegendarySwordsman2)
description:
Hordes of customers are charging in and the shelves are empty! Are you up to the task?!

Stock the Shelves is a frantic singleplayer experience where your only goal is to restock the shelves as crowds of customers come in buying everything in sight, but with a twist, for every shelf you stock you must complete a minigame of sorts to finish restocking, some may challenge your memory while others may challenge your reaction times, how long can YOU last before your customers storm out in a huff?

------------------------- Controller Recommended -------------------------

Note Stock The Shelves is currently in early access and there's way more content to come, if you're interested in getting updates or just want to get to know me come join the Discord! https://discord.gg/U2smJDy8FW

Credits

-Art from LimeZu using both Modern Interiors and Modern Exteriors

-UI Input Prompts from GreatDocBrown

-UI from the Unity Asset Store (Will likely be switched to LimeZu's UI pack when it releases)

-Special thanks to LimeZu for helping me setup this Itch page
